name: 安特卫普的尼洛 Nello in Antwerp
name_original: 安特卫普的尼洛 Nello in Antwerp
description:
• Interact with locals in Antwerp, Belgium, through conversations that include options.
  • Create paintings in various parts of the game world and provide them to specific characters.
  • Get drawing papers and brushes in the game world.
